div.p: The biggest thing I love doing is anything to do with cars, motorbikes, anything with two wheels, four wheels. I’ll be taking it apart, putting it back together
normally failing; and photography, I’m really into my photography. I am in a happy relationship; I’ve been with my girlfriend for 4 years,
4½ years let’s get this right! We’ve just bought a flat together, we are just settling down, looking at marriage, looking at all the scary things in life...
